title: Manage a Commercial Card Program
description: A corporate administrator needs to issue a new commercial credit card to an employee and set their spending limits.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the employee's name and information.

tasks.description: Issue a new card under the company's commercial card program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new card number for the employee.

tasks.description: Set the spending controls for the new card, such as a monthly limit and merchant category code restrictions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a $5,000 monthly limit and blocks categories like gambling.
